description: Because of this game I also bought on Steam Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine! This is the first game of this type that I played and it taught me the gameplay mechanics and strategy. A very relaxing and absorbing, yet keeps the player really focused. Great overall design, including the really well picked sound effects and music. The controls are very good - very easy to use a gamepad and game is responsive. The animations are so cute and the gameplay is as well?️ Definitely worth checking out if you never played. This game should come preinstalled with every Linux distribution?️
summary: Wonderful game, well made and very entertaining?️

description: it definitely plays like puyo puyo, would recommend
Many years ago, i used to play this a lot, now that i'm back to linux i have installed it again :D

All-in-all, it's a good Puyo Puyo clone, however, the music needs some work (It's unsettling at times) and the enemies need to be memorable with appearance. on top of that I need to know the story! what's the story! who am I fighting and why?
Good game dynamics, graphics, music and FX. It is missing multiplayer though. Store game description isn't really helpful since gameplay is quite far from the one of Tetris.
Great game! Leaves my screen resolution at 640X480 double screen with no way out other than to log out and back into new session in Ubuntu.
summary: Great game! Messes with screen reslolution!
